data.description: Radiance Technologies is an employee-owned company with benefits that are unmatched by most companies in the Huntsville, AL or Dayton, OH areas. Employee ownership, generous 401K, full health/dental/life/vision insurance benefits, interesting assignments, educational reimbursement, competitive salaries, and a pleasant work environment combine to make Radiance Technologies a great place to work and succeed.We are searching for motivated engineering students to join our exploitation and analysis group to start a career in Reverse Engineering. The ideal candidate will grow his/her knowledge and skills within our Reverse Engineering Lab by experimenting on hardware and software in order to analyze and characterize these technologies. Desired internship outcomes converting to full-time employment opportunities. Required Skills:· Working towards a Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science.· US Citizenship with the ability to obtain a security clearance.· Basic knowledge of calculus-based mathematics.· Basic knowledge of software development, languages, compilers, and tools such as: C/C++· Basic knowledge of hardware principles and tools such as: verilog, vhdl, synthesis.· Interest and/or experience working with reverse engineering tools.· Motivated self-starter with a strong willingness to learn advanced analysis techniques in support of our mission.· Sustained excellence in academic performance.Desired Qualifications:· Basic knowledge of calculus-based mathematics and physics.· Basic knowledge of embedded system development· High level desire to help their nation solve its most critical problems.· Exhibits the characteristics of a continuous learner.· Willing to work alongside senior engineers to learn from experts.EOE/Minorities/Females/Vet/Disabled
